name: Ranger's Bramble
summary: You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of entangle.
description:
You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of entangle. A creature that critically fails the save takes 2d4 persistent bleed damage in addition to being immobilized. Escaping your bramble doesn't end the bleed damage.

------

Heightened (+1) The bleed damage on a critical failure increases by 1d4.
